summary: Mutes the drum thump UI notifier noise on critical hits, including sneak attacks and those granted by perks.
descriptionHtml:
Mutes the drum thump UI notifier noise on critical hits, including sneak attacks and those granted by perks.  

Anybody may use this file however they want.  It\'s just a one second soundbyte of silence in the appropriate file directory!  

Install: unpack to Skyrim/Data
Uninstall: delete Data/Sound/fx/ui/ui_sneakattack_01.wav
author: Aluminumfoil
